GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves an array containing a given review_id

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments which match a given review_id

comments.body: Now this is a story all about how, board games turned my life upside down
comments.author: mallionaire

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: posts a new comment when passed a valid comment object containing a body and username (the username must exist in the users table)

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: modifies the votes property of a review when passed a valid inc_votes object containing a number with which to modify the votes value
